channel.title: Logout
channel.description:
people click Click here to Logout. but it doesnt log them out, i have my own Client, but its not the client its the server i tryed a different source with my Client and it Loged out fine, any Suggestions?
Thanks, Andrew.

item.title: Logout
item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

public void logout() {
	killMyNPCs();
	if(inPitsGame){
	inPitsGame = false;
	PlayerHandler.playersInPit -= 1;
	println_debug(playerName + " resetted pits!");
	}
	resetfollowers();
	savegame(true);
	outStream.createFrame(109);
	//logoutButton = true;
}

	case 202:
		// idle logout packet
		if(!inCombat)
		logout();
		break;

e.t.c. find the rest for urself

Read full topic
